name: Tap Symbol
description: It is the process of rotating a permanent sideways to activate abilities or to declare attackers.

name: Untap Symbol
description: It is the process of rotating a permanent back to the upright position, you untap during the beginning step.

name: White Mana
description: White mana symbol, usually generated by the Plains land type.

name: Blue Mana
description: Blue mana symbol, usually generated by the Island land type.

name: Black Mana
description: Black mana symbol, usually generated by the Swamp land type.

name: Red Mana
description: Red mana symbol, usually generated by the Mountain land type.

name: Green Mana
description: Green mana symbol, usually generated by the Forest land type.

name: Colourless Mana
description: Colourless mana symbol, usually generated by the Wastes land type.

name: Generic Mana
description: A variable cost to cast a spell, generic mana can be generated by any type of lands.

name: X Symbol
description: Represents a number you choose when casting the spell. You pay that amount of mana, and the spell's effect depends on the value you chose.
